trans-unit.source: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.
trans-unit.target: Descrive il grado in cui un tipo di carattere è stato rispetto alle proporzioni normali del tipo di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font.
trans-unit.target: Estensione di un tipo di carattere descrive il grado in cui un formato di carattere rispetto alle proporzioni normale, ovvero la larghezza originale del rapporto dell'altezza specificato per i glifi nel tipo di carattere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches> values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches>valori corrispondono al `usWidthClass` definizione il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica.</xref:System.Windows.FontStretches>

trans-unit.source: The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9—lower values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths.
trans-unit.target: Il `usWidthClass` rappresenta un valore integer compreso tra 1 e 9, i valori più bassi indicano larghezze; i valori superiori indicano larghezze maggiori.

trans-unit.source: |Font stretch|usWidthClass|% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|1|50.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|2|62.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|3|75.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|4|87.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|5|100.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|6|112.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|7|125.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8|150.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|9|200.0%| For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: | Estensione del carattere | usWidthClass | % Normal | |------------------|------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|&1; |&50;.0% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|&2; | il&62;,5% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|&3; |&75;.0% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|&4; |&87;,5% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|&5; |&100;,0% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|&6; | il&112;,5% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|&7; |&125;.0% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8| %&150;.0 | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|&9; |&200;,0% | Per ulteriori informazioni sul [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` valore, vedere il ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) sezione del [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica.</xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *fontStretchesValue* A value expressed as the name string, such as "Condensed", "Normal", or "Expanded".
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` ``` # # valori XAML *fontStretchesValue* A valore espresso come stringa del nome, ad esempio "Ridotta", "Normal" o "Expanded".

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: When the return value is less than zero, `left` is less than `right`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il valore restituito è minore di zero, `left` è minore di `right`.

trans-unit.source: When this value is zero, it indicates that both operands are equal.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo valore è zero, significa che entrambi gli operandi sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that `left` is greater than `right`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il valore è maggiore di zero, significa che `left` è maggiore di `right`.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the relationship between the two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int32>valore che rappresenta la relazione tra le due istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Compares a <xref:System.Object> with the current <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Confronta un <xref:System.Object>con corrente <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref:System.Object> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: L'istanza del <xref:System.Object>da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if two instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se due istanze sono uguali. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares a <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object with the current <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> that corresponds to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] usStretchClass value.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> che corrisponde alla [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] valore usStretchClass.

trans-unit.source: An integer value between one and nine that corresponds to the usStretchValue definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero compreso tra uno e nove che corrisponde alla definizione usStretchValue nella [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the hash code for this object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il codice hash per questo oggetto.

trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int32>che rappresenta il codice hash per l'oggetto.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> specifying the format to use.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.String>che specifica il formato da utilizzare.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per utilizzare il formato predefinito per il tipo del <xref:System.IFormattable>implementazione.</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IFormatProvider>da utilizzare per formattare il valore.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per ottenere le informazioni di formato numerico dalle impostazioni locali correnti del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>contenente il valore dell'istanza corrente nel formato specificato.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usStretchClass` for this <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che rappresenta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usStretchClass` per questo <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An integer value between 1 and 999 that corresponds to the `usStretchClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero compreso tra 1 e 999 che corrisponde al `usStretchClass` definizione il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.String> representation of the current <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.String>rappresentazione dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> oggetto basato sulle impostazioni cultura correnti.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>rappresentazione dell'oggetto di valore.</xref:System.String>
